text: "Treehouse of Horror III" is the 5th episode of The Simpsons' fourth season. It was first shown on television on October 29, 1992. It is the third episode of the Treehouse of Horror series. In the episode, Bart gets an evil talking doll, King Homer is taken by Mr. Burns, and Bart and Lisa start a zombie apocalypse. The episode was written by Al Jean, Mike Reiss, Jay Kogen, Wallace Wolodarsky, Sam Simon, and Jon Vitti. Carlos Baeza is the director for the episode. ==References== ==Other websites== *"Treehouse of Horror III" at The Simpsons.com * * * Category:The Simpsons (season 4) episodes Category:1992 television episodes Category:Treehouse of Horror
title: Treehouse of Horror III
